Token.Abstract: The protocol for a GRMustacheTemplateRepository's dataSource.
Returns a template ID, that is to say an object that uniquely identifies a template or a template partial.

Parameter.Name: templateRepository
Parameter.Abstract: The GRMustacheTemplateRepository asking for a template ID.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the template or template partial.

Parameter.Name: baseTemplateID
Parameter.Abstract: The template ID of the enclosing template, or nil.

Token.Abstract: Provided with a template ID that comes from templateRepository:templateIDForName:relativeToTemplateID:, returns a Mustache template string.

Parameter.Name: templateRepository
Parameter.Abstract: The GRMustacheTemplateRepository asking for a Mustache template string.

Parameter.Name: templateID
Parameter.Abstract: The template ID of the template

Parameter.Name: outError
Parameter.Abstract: If there is an error returning a template string, upon return contains nil, or an NSError object that describes the problem.
